Department of Civil and Materials Engineering     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Department of Civil and Materials Engineering      Department of Civil and Materials Engineering   Main Menu    Undergraduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Accreditation    Civil Engineering Major    Courses    Minors    Internships and Jobs    Student Groups    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Graduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Courses    NEW MS in Construction Engineering and Management    MS Programs    PhD Programs    PhD Dissertations    Post-Graduation Outcomes    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Research           High-Bay Structures Laboratory    Labs    Research Areas    Student Research Opportunities    Seminars         Faculty and Staff           Department Head    Core Faculty    Courtesy and Dual Appointments    Emeritus Faculty    Faculty Awards    Professional Advisory Council    Staff    Open Positions         News    Events     Eyebrow menu    Giving    Alumni    College of Engineering Home    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Department of Civil and Materials Engineering    Undergraduate    Student Organizations    Construction Management Association of America        Construction Management Association of America       intro      The Construction Management Association of America at UIC is a student chapter of the national professional organization of the same name. The organization’s mission is to promote the construction management profession and the use of qualified construction managers on capital projects and programs.  CMAA@UIC works with CMAA Chicago to provide educational, networking, and professional opportunities to graduates of the construction management program at UIC. In addition to being a registered student organization at UIC, our chapter is recognized by CMAA National Headquarters and chartered in affiliation with CMAA Chicago.  Contact us: uic.cmaa@gmail.com       Leadership   Executive Board:   President: Francisco Lopez  Vice President: Jacob Miguest  Treasurer: Zaneta Marcinik   Faculty Advisor:   Hossein Ataei        Activities   Recent networking activities:   Career night and networking session with Clayco Inc.  Educational seminar on lean construction by Turner Construction Co.  Site visit to Willis Tower repositioning project  Site visit to Ozinga concrete production plant   Present goals:   Continue to increase student member enrollment  Connect members with construction management firms in Chicago  Increase the number of site visits in Chicagoland area  Organize more networking and professional events with CMAA Chicago           Undergraduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Accreditation    Civil Engineering Major    Courses    Minors    Internships and Jobs    Student Groups    Student Profiles    Student Resources
